title: How I imagine Kassadin must feel about being nerfed
body:
{{champion:38}} Huh? Why is it so dark here? Where am I?

{{item:2052}}  Welcome Kassadin. I must say, your arrival is quite unexpected

{{champion:38}} Who is that? REVEAL YOURSELF!

{{champion:6}} It's been a while Kassadin, how has the balance team been treating you?

{{champion:38}} Urgot? Where have you been? 

{{champion:2}} I'm here too... WE all are

{{champion:82}} Welcome Kassadin, this is the final resting place for all the champions that have been destroyed by the Riot Balance team. This is the end of the line for you

{{champion:38}} N...no. But why was I nerfed? My winrate hasn't been over 50% in ages, hardly anyone picks me.

{{champion:41}}  They had to nerf a champion with mobility so they could pretend to oppose the mobility creep without having to nerf {{champion:64}} , you were sacrificed so that monstrosity could live on

{{champion:38}} I MUST ESCAPE, THE PEOPLE OF VALORAN NEED ME THE VOID DRAWS NEAR 

*Riftwalks*

{{champion:38}} What? Why cant I escape? 

{{champion:28}} The wall separating us from the outside world is 699 units thick

*Checks PBE*

{{champion:28}} Looks like the range on your ult is 450 now

{{champion:38}} But that's ridiculous! That's lower than Ezreals Arcane Shift!

{{champion:78}}  Oh well, guess you're stuck with us. Wanna play poker?

{{champion:38}} Who the fuck are you? 

{{champion:78}} ;w;

{{champion:6}} Oh well, if you're lucky this nerf will make you bad enough to be picked in Nemesis Draft

{{champion:38}} NOOOOOOOO

{{champion:83}}  Soon {{champion:45}} will join our ranks as well

---

{{champion:45}} *Shivers*

{{champion:117}} Is something wrong honey?

{{champion:45}} It feels like I got nerfed hard

---

I see that a lot of people are complaining that X champion shouldn't be on this list and that they are in fact very strong, and while I agree that every champion has it's own strengths not everyone thinks that way. So let's try to refrain from posting those types of comments and just enjoy the thread

ty

Kassadin is actually a pretty common pick at higher elos, but let's just keep pretending otherwise for the sake of making posts about it.

Its not about his win rate, its about other junglers that can't compete against him. Ppl are saying this for ages.

Lee doesn't need nerfs. He needs a rework.

In a similar vein, this nerf is also not about Kassadin's win rate. They hardly ever are. 

Kassadin was never going to be balanced when he could blink huge distances every 3 seconds. The mana limitation wasn't really that big a deal, because if you ever have to blink more than maybe 3 times in rapid succession then you fucked up so hard that you would be dead as any other champion in the game. His usage at higher levels of play attests to that.

God forbid that Kassadin might need to think about what he's doing instead of just ulting in, delivering a combo, surviving with his tanky stats and maybe using zhonyas if things get really bad and then ulting out.

Yes, I always wonder in which case would you absolutely need to flash more than 3 times, since apparently having any kind of mana limitation counts as a huge flaw, no matter how insignificant it really is in practice.
And don't forget "bad early". You know, because "bad early" applies to the first 5 minutes of the game before lvl 6. Must be such a pain to survive with that flask and passive and fearing all that burst from mages who didn't unlock their ults yet. Such high-risk, Anivia has nothing on that.

Except he's melee, so you have to make up any cs you didn't get from being zoned {{champion:268}} **AND** due to his relatively low damage, unless a mid is forced to use their cc/main damage spell on minions, they can still stand up to him. 

Baiting out the cc is pretty risky. Any competent person will know to save their cc for a clearer shot, because otherwise, you should be right on them when they miss. If you're thinking "just blink out of the way" you have obviously been dodging {{champion:34}} stuns all day, because anything other than that will have you teleporting to them stunned, snared, charmed, or rooted.

Kass is not as easy as he sounds. Unless you snowball. Then he's like every other assassin. Making you wish you never started a game.
